title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars are enabled but not functional in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, they do not have any effect. Even when opening a small image like an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled. 3. Attempt to move the scrollbars. 4. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect, regardless of the size of the image opened.
